feed.title: Infisical Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.116.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove addAllMembers option from project creation modal by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3206
  • add gateway security docs by @maidul98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3197
  • Gateway patch up by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3210
  • Permission boundary check by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3057
  • Use slug to check tag on remove icon click by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3208
  • Allow project slug edition by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3207
  • fix: breaking change check fix by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3212
  • feat: removed ca pool from dialing by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3213
  • Add is-admin filter to Server Admin Console and add a component to shâ€¦ by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3201
  • add system md service for gateway by @maidul98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3211
  • Daniel/reset password serverside by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3198
  • feat: changed to permission check by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3214
  • fix: change dd-mm-yy to mm-dd-yy by @mahyarmirrashed in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3215
  • feat(api/secrets): view secret value permission 2 by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3190
  • feat: removed user paywall for user management at instance level and fixed a type error by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3220
  • feat: Add password requirements to dyanmic secret by @maidul98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3216
  • fix: list secrets permissioning bug by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3222
  • misc: improve support for jwks via http by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3223
  • Improvement: Databrick Integration Doc Improvements by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3225
  • Add proper support for systemd by @maidul98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3226
  • docs(platform): secret scanning by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3229
  • Feature: Role Access Tree by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3230
  • Resolved approval rejecting on delete secret by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3232
  • fix: ui glitching on hover by @mahyarmirrashed in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3234
  • feat: add ability to view machine identities in admin console by @mahyarmirrashed in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3224
  • Improvement: Add Organization Name Constraint by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3196
  • Resolved create and update failing for service token by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3237
  • Resolved machine identity renew token not working as expected by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3236

New Contributors

  • @mahyarmirrashed made their first contribution in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3215

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.115.0-postgres...infisical/v0.116.0-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.117.0-postgres
entry.content:
Important Notice

Please update to v0.117.1 for SAML CVE patch in node-saml

What's Changed

  • feat(k8s): configmap support by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3239
  • Add Humanitec secret sync integration by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3235
  • Feat/allow share to anyone edition by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3221

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical-cli/v0.36.17...infisical/v0.117.0-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.117.1-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Upgrade passport/saml to 5.0 by @maidul98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3247
  • Grammar fixes to local-development.mdx by @kanad13 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3248

New Contributors

  • @kanad13 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3248

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.117.0-postgres...infisical/v0.117.1-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical-cli/v0.36.18
entry.content:
Changelog

  • 18c32d872 Revert "feat: confirm environment exists when running run command"

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical-cli/v0.36.19
entry.content:
Changelog

  • 440ada464 Merge pull request #3259 from Infisical/feat/automated-instance-bootstrapping
  • 3944e20a5 Merge pull request #3257 from Infisical/feat/addFileImportToSecretSetCLI
  • 049f0f56a misc: added env support for the other cli flags
  • f059d65b4 misc: finalized response
  • d91add2e7 misc: added return statements
  • ad6f285b5 Throw if file and args secrets are used on secret set command
  • d4842dd27 Improve secret set --file message and make it mutually exclusive with manual secrets args
  • 64569ab44 feat: added bootstrap to CLI
  • 838c1af44 Add file option to secret set CLI command to retrieve secrets from .env or .yaml files
